__e: Nothing's wrong with propulsion, but the commands from the helm just aren't getting there.
There's nothing wrong with that engine.
This is a new engine... it's bound to have a few bugs to work out.
And that keeps me moving forward and has kept me moving forward for the last forty years.
Madam President. Uh, three ships have reported engine trouble and want to know... when they'll be receiving engineering assistance from Galactica.
